trans:
We are pleased to inform you that our clinic is developing and changing to take even better care of your health and comfort. Thanks to your support and trust, we can improve the quality of our services, which is why we decided to consolidate our activities in one place - we are creating a modern, comprehensively equipped center that will allow us to respond to your needs more fully. ğŸŒŸ ğŸ’™
Why are we consolidating our services?
Moving our business to one main location allows us to focus on development and modernization, as well as on implementing the latest technologies and therapies. Thanks to this, we will be able to offer an even wider range of specialized treatments and modern therapeutic programs. We want every visit to be even more comfortable and effective for you.
â¡ï¸What does this mean for you?
âœ… Greater comfort and a full range of services in one place
All of our previous services will be available in the new, better equipped center at ul. Ogrodowa 58. Thanks to this, we provide not only higher comfort of each visit, but also even more efficient service. The new location was designed with your convenience in mind â€“ there is a spacious parking lot, adapted entrances and modern equipment that will allow us to take even more effective care of your health.
